casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

May, 1938.

(May 4, 1938.) Dan S. O’Leary, Residing at 153 Alabama Street, Buffalo, New York, Respondent, v. Hearst Magazines, Inc., a Delaware Corporation, Appellant.

Order affirmed, with ten dollars costs and disbursements. All concur, except Sears, P. J., who dissents and votes for reversal and for dismissal of the complaint. (The order denies defendant’s motion for judgment on the pleadings and for dismissal of the complaint, in an action for libel.) Present- — ■ Sears, P. J., Crosby, Cunningham, Taylor and Dowling, JJ. [167 Mise. 481.]
